definition: adornment/to adorn/dress/clothing/costume (of an actor in a play)/to play a role/to pretend/to install/to fix/to wrap (sth in a bag)/to load/to pack
to join/to fit/to mate/to mix/to match/to deserve/to make up (a prescription)/to allocate
thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)

sentences.english: "A car assembly line is an apt analogy, " White said. "Bipedality is the frame.
sentences.chinese: “一條汽車裝配線是一個挺合適的類比，”懷特說。

sentences.english: I improved our assembly line of the electric fans.
sentences.chinese: 作爲電機工程師，我改進了電風扇的裝配線。

sentences.english: After we remove the hazardous materials, we will resume the assembly process.
sentences.chinese: 我們移除危險物品後，裝配線將重新啓用。

sentences.english: Study on parallel mixed-model assembly with resource constraints is few in the open literature.
sentences.chinese: 帶有資源約束的並行混流裝配線目前很少有人研究。

sentences.english: We lack the ability to mass-produce on large-scale assembly lines.
sentences.chinese: 我們缺乏在大規模裝配線上從事大量生產的能力。

sentences.english: Working on an assembly line can be incredibly boring and tiring.
sentences.chinese: 裝配線的工作通常會極端無聊而累人。

sentences.english: Ant colony optimization for mixed-model assembly line balancing problem (MMALBP) is studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了混合型裝配線平衡問題的智能蟻羣優化算法。

sentences.english: The trembles of the umbrella assembly lines have resemblances.
sentences.chinese: 這些雨傘裝配線的抖動有相似之處。

sentences.english: 1913 - Ford Motor Company introduces the first moving assembly line.
sentences.chinese: 1913年，福特汽車公司引入第一條流水裝配線。

sentences.english: Technical documents edit and release of products for assembly line and painting line.
sentences.chinese: 裝配線和塗裝線產品工藝文件的編制及發放。

sentences.english: The trembles of the umbrella assembly lines HAs resemblances.
sentences.chinese: 這一部分雨傘裝配線的抖動有相似之處。

sentences.english: In either case, assembly-line thinking is the norm.
sentences.chinese: 無論哪種情況，裝配線式思維方式都是標準。

sentences.english: We also provide several professional conveyors for automobile assembly line.
sentences.chinese: 我們也爲汽車裝配線提供多款專業的輸送系統。

sentences.english: A: Do you think assembly line workers feel the same way?
sentences.chinese: 你認爲在裝配線上工作的工人也這麼想嗎？

sentences.english: Heavy construction machinery-round development of the assembly line and the transfer of R &D projects.
sentences.chinese: 工程機械支重輪的研發及其裝配線研發項目轉讓。
